dcterms:creator: Y. Lecun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It is a benchmark dataset for evaluating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: J. Deng
W. Dong
R. Socher
L.-J. Li
K. Li
L. Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: ImageNet is a large-scale hierarchical image database that provides a vast collection of images organized according to the WordNet hierarchy. It is widely used for training and evaluating image classification models.
dcterms:title: ImageNet
